page.title: 04Education Schools Today 1985
page.content: In my school Cornard Middle we start school at 8.50 and finish at 3.35.We have many lessons such as English, Humanities, French, Science, Maths, Design, Tutorial, Options, PE and Games.We have detentions and extra work but no caning.Each year has an area in the school.We see several teachers a day and move around in school.We see our group tutor most.We have special rooms for cookery, art, science, drama, music and woodwork and have a cosy library.Our school is light and airy with lots of windows for light.Ceilings are low and there are many bright display areas to pin our work.Some rooms have dividers we can fold back to make bigger rooms.We have a break in the morning and an hours lunch break for either school dinners or packed lunches.We attend our school from the age of 9 to 13.
